desc.p: This file is keyed on CATEGORY.YYYYMM.COMPANY, it holds the list of days of activity under DAY.NO and the associated multi-valued field THREAD holds the list of sessions for each day.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
